entry.title: [RBX7][vRack] Public traffic through vRack instabilities
entry.content:
May 11, 14:53 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 11/05/2023 14:35 UTC
End Time : 11/05/2023 14:37 UTC
Service impact : Communication loss of public traffic announced through vRack in RBX7
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
